# UIBehavioralStyle.mac

**Case**

A style that indicates that a control appears and behaves as it does in macOS.

## Declaration

```swift
case mac
```

## Discussion

This style effects a control’s behavior only when the app’s user interface idiom is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIUserInterfaceIdiom/mac].

## Styles

- **UIBehavioralStyle.automatic**: A style the system chooses based on the app’s targeted platform.
- **UIBehavioralStyle.pad**: A style that indicates that a control appears and behaves as it does in iPadOS.
